name: Fleet Command: A Text Based Adventure
name_original: Fleet Command: A Text Based Adventure
description:
You are a random citizen in outer space that woke up in a random place with no recollection of how you got there. 

Command your own fleet and send it where you'd like it to go!

Meet wacky characters!

Make meaningful decisions!

Collect all shuttles, transports, freighters, yacht, starfighter, bomber, scout ship, gunship, assault ship, warship and more!

This is a PS Vita game and MAYBE windows.
